entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Paulatuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:27 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -21.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Paulatuk Airport 12:40 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -21.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -24.7°C
Wind: W 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:33 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:33 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming south 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:33 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023
